mapper.select: SELECT p.settlement_num, p.brand_code, b.brandname, m.nickname, TO_CHAR(point_amount, '999,999,999') point_amount, TO_CHAR(settlement_date, 'YY/MM/DD') settlement_date, p.deposit, p.state FROM settlement_point p JOIN seller_brand b ON b.brand_code = p.brand_code JOIN member m ON b.memberidx = m.memberidx

SELECT DISTINCT c.withdraw_num, c.brand_code, b.brandname, m.nickname, TO_CHAR(c.point_amount, '999,999,999') point_amount2, TO_CHAR(surcharge, '999,999,999') surcharge, TO_CHAR(withdraw_date, 'YY/MM/DD') withdraw_date, c.state as state2 FROM settlement_cash c JOIN settlement_point p ON c.brand_code = p.brand_code JOIN seller_brand b ON b.brand_code = p.brand_code JOIN member m ON b.memberidx = m.memberidx

SELECT DISTINCT d.item_code, p.settlement_date, t.brand_code, o.order_code, o.productcode, o.quantity, t.item, t.price, (t.price - (t.price * t.discount / 100)) discount, (t.price * t.discount / 100) discountt, (t.price - (t.price * t.discount / 100)) + (t.price * t.discount / 100) realprice FROM settlement_point p JOIN settlement_detail d ON p.settlement_num = d.settlement_num LEFT JOIN settlement_cash c ON c.brand_code = p.brand_code JOIN order_item o ON o.item_code = d.item_code JOIN product t ON o.productcode = t.productcode WHERE p.settlement_num = #{settlement_num}
